column2: The Doux Bond & Shield System
column3:
Repair. Reinforce. Protect.
Your curls deserve a system, not just products. The Doux Rewind Curl Retention Shampoo and Fast Forward Bond-Building Conditioner work in tandem to cleanse, rebuild, and shield curls against the toughest conditions.

Strength Meets Shield

·       Rewind the Damage – A curl retention shampoo that cleanses without stripping and primes curls for lasting shape.

·       Fast Forward to Protection – A bond-building conditioner that strengthens from within and creates a shield against heat and Middle East humidity.

·       Colour Care – Guards vibrancy and reduces breakage in colour-treated curls.

·       Porosity Perfected – Especially effective for medium to high porosity curls that crave strength and lasting defense.

·       Resilient Results – Shine, bounce, and definition—without compromise.

column2: Summer Curl Edit – Dew | Low to Medium Porosity Curl Ritual
column3:
Your answer to summer styling without the weight.
Dew is your low to medium porosity ritual—crafted for curls that resist moisture, frizz easily, and fall flat in the heat.

Inside this editorial curation, you'll find a humidity-proof layering system designed to hydrate without heaviness, define without crunch, and hold without buildup.

Each product is meticulously selected for its lightweight texture, ingredient harmony, and climate-specific performance under Middle Eastern heat. It’s curation, not guesswork.

 

What's inside:

1 X Uncle Funky's Daughter Midnite Train Leave In (8oz)

1 X Kinky Curly Knot Today Leave In (8oz)

1 X The Doux Mousse Def Texture Foam (7oz)

1 X TreLuxe Hi Definition Styling Gel (8oz)

column2: Mummy & Me Kit - Low to Medium Porosity
column3:
Support delicate curls with care and consistency.

Curated especially for little ones with low to medium porosity hair, this gentle yet effective ritual supports strands that resist moisture but retain it once it’s sealed in. Each product has been handpicked to soften strands, encourage moisture penetration, reduce frizz, and deliver long lasting nourishment without heaviness or build up.

Whether you’re learning your child’s hair together or already in your groove, this set empowers you to care with confidence.

column2: The Doux 808 Base Gel
column3:
Drop the base and watch your curls go boom. 808 Base Gel lays down the foundation for every curl style in your rotation – from wash-and-gos to twist-outs. This medium-hold gel brings the bass line your curls need to stay defined and frizz-free all day.

808 Base Gel is the beat drop your curls have been waiting for. Like its namesake bass drum that anchors every track, this gel creates the foundation that makes your whole style hit different.

The medium-hold formula strikes that perfect balance – strong enough to lock in your pattern but flexible enough to keep curls bouncy and touchable. While other gels leave you crunchy or flaky, 808 keeps it smooth with a formula that defines without the drama. It's built to be your first layer, creating a frizz-fighting base that other products can build on.

Use it solo for simple, defined curls or stack it under MOUSSE DEF for next-level volume and hold. Your wash-and-go just got more reliable, your twist-out more defined, and your TWA more popping. This is the gel that turns good curl days into great ones – because every masterpiece starts with a solid foundation.

Frizz trying to remix your style? Not happening.

Definition falling flat by midday? 808's got the stamina.

Your curls about to stay fresh from morning meeting to midnight.

WET IT: Start with soaking wet hair (water is your friend)
APPLY IT: Apply in sections, letting curls clump naturally.
ROCK IT: Rock it solo or layer MOUSSE DEF on top for extra hold.
DIFFUSE IT: Diffuse until 100% dry for maximum bounce.
FLUFF IT: Fluff from the roots and let them curls live.
THE BASE: 808 always goes first – it's the base, remember? No oils or creams before this gel. Let it do its job as the foundation, then build your style from there.

column2: The Doux Bananas Xtreme Hold Hair Gel
column3:
This hold is bananas, B-A-N-A-N-A-S! The Bananas Xtreme hold Hair Gel is the extreme styler that locks your look down tighter than Fort Knox.

BANANAS XTREME HOLD HAIR GEL said "let's go crazy" and meant every word. This isn't playing around with medium hold – we're talking extreme, unbreakable, your-hair-isn't-moving-till-you-say-so kind of control.

Whether you're sculpting glass-hair sleek edges, creating gravity-defying spikes that salute the sky, or slicking back a style so smooth it looks like liquid, BANANAS delivers that professional-strength hold.

The formula brings serious grip without the helmet head effect – your style stays locked but doesn't feel like concrete. Perfect for when you need your hair to stay exactly where you put it, no questions asked. From intricate designs to simple slick-backs, from defined curls to sculptural styles, this gel has the muscle to make it happen.

And here's where it gets bananas – when you're ready to switch it up, just add water and watch it reactivate like magic.

No flaking, no residue, just extreme hold that goes hard but stays flexible enough to rework. Your style game is about to go absolutely bananas.

column2: Mummy & Me Curl Experience – Edition One (June 14)
column3:
Where Little Curls Are Celebrated

A first-of-its-kind ritual curated by Emerson Hair & Beauty.
This intimate experience is designed to bring mothers and their little ones into a world where curl care becomes connection.

Your Ticket Includes:
- A guided curl care session led by Emerson’s curl educators
- Styling activity with our lead stylist
- Signature gift kit curated for you and your child
- A personalized curl keepsake to take home
- Refreshments, bonding, and joy

Event Details:
Date: June 14, 2025
Time: 11:00 AM – 2:00PM
Location: Kanvas, Al Quoz, Dubai

Important Notes:
- Tickets are non-refundable
- One ticket admits one adult + one child
- A follow-up RSVP form will be sent after booking to confirm attendee details

column2: The Doux Bee Girl Honey Curl Custard
column3:
Meet the custard that doesn’t just style your curls - it revives them. This luxurious, honey-infused formula drenches even the tightest coils in lasting hydration while sculpting definition that feels soft to the touch - never crunchy, never flaking.

The secret? Super-charged honey with a positive charge that smooths the cuticle, locks in moisture, and ignites mirror-like shine.

Every scoop is fortified with Aloe and powerhouse vitamins B, C & E to protect growth, while Keratin and Silk Amino Acids wrap each strand in strength and bounce. The result: curls that spring, move, and glow with confidence - juicy, touchable, alive.

 

Because thirsty curls don’t just need control

column2: TréLuxe Aloe Vera Curl Primer
column3:
Save time on washday, and throughout the week! TréLuxe innovative Aloe Vera Curl Primer:

✔️reduces detangling time by up to 70%,

✔️smooths and defines curls for easier application of styling products,

✔️reduces the amount of water needed to refresh curls between wash days,

✔️decreases drying time without sacrificing moisture.

This is the beginning of long-lasting, frizz-free curl definition that you no longer have to work for!

How it works: The primer's plant-based ingredients help smooth, detangle, moisturize, and soften your waves and curls to extend wash day results, and save time when refreshing. The extreme slip makes detangling a breeze; and well-defined curls are quickly served up without weighing down delicate strands, due to the lightweight formula. 

Can be used as a: Pre-Style Primer | Pre-poo Detangler | Moisturizing/Curl Clumping Refresher

column3:

Great hair butter for moisturizing, length retention, dry hair, strength, anti-breakage & split ends. Pair it with your leave-in conditioner or hair cream to boost results.


-Length Retention 

- Zero water formula

The perfect remedy for chronically dry hair, damaged ends and frizzy hair.  This blend of Brazilian butters seals the hair for long-lasting hydration, controls frizz, helps prevent split ends, strengthens and hydrates damaged ends. column50:
Cachos means "Curls" in Portuguese.

Packed with the finest ingredients from the Amazon Rainforest, Cachos Brazil have crafted products that will thoroughly nourish your strands, whilst also increasing manageability, elasticity and improve the overall health of your hair.

From ancient roots and practises, the products contain exceptional herbs that are phenomenal for strengthening the hair naturally and also survive in such humid climates.

The beauty of these products - a little goes a long way! You no longer need to layer your strands with lots of products to see real results. Your hair will be full of quality ingredients that are rich in nutrients, vitamins, beta-carotene, absorption, and protection.

The entire product range is CG approved.
column52:
Section out your hair into 2 to 4 parts and secure it with clips.

Scoop up a small amount of the Hair Butter for each section then rub your hands together until the butter becomes an oil.

Gently apply and work it into each section and style as usual. Pay special attention to the ends.

Pumpkin Seed Oil - provides hydration, protection and gloss and conditions the scalp, hair and skin.

column50:
Curls and Potions was founded with a pinch of a rebellious fighting spirit and a pinch of wanting to change one curl at a time. With one fighting Breast Cancer and one wanting to make the most of the curls and coils, the idea was born to focus on ways to blend healthy hair with overall wellness. 

Every idea begins with a problem and ours was simple: healthy hair, healthy living, and an amazing wash-n-go. The idea of having one without the other just didn’t make sense.  We focused on changing the way we think about overall health and hair, they go hand in hand.  So how did we fix that? We took ingredients that help with overall wellness sprinkled with a little bit of old traditional hair recipes and created the new blends that Curls & Potions® needed to help change the way we look at hair and health.  Healthy Hair + Healthy Lifestyle = Good Hair.

Do not rinse, style as usual

column2: Curls & Potions Chebula & Green Tea Hair Repair Rinse
column3:
This Chebula & Green Tea Hair Rinse is the solution to hair loss and shedding.
Green Tea is packed with anti-inflammatory properties that helps to reduce hair loss, stimulates hair growth, & keeps your scalp clean. Green Tea contains catechins which help to block DHT (hormone responsible for hair loss).
Fenugreek is high in protein and nicotinic acid content which is known to help combat dandruff and hair loss. It also aids in moisturizing the hair and restores sheen to strands.
Chebula aka Haritaki is an Ayurvedic herb  that helps promote hair growth and alleviate scalp issues. It is known to help prevent hair loss and reduce hair graying

column2: Kinky-Curly Styling Solution Kit
column3:
Say GOODBYE to lackluster curls and coils with the ultimate styling solution by Kinky-Curly. The dynamic duo that many curlies swear by!

This styling kit includes: 1 x Kinky - Curly Knot Today and 1 x Kinky- Curly Curling Custard

 KNOT TODAY TM is a creamy herbal conditioner and detangler designed to smooth the cuticle and remove knots, snarls and tangles from thick curly textured hair.

After washing hair, apply KNOT TODAY TM generously and work through troubled areas with a wide tooth comb.

Can be used as a regular rinse out conditioner for wavy hair or as a leave-in for curlier hair types. An excellent product to use after removing braids and extensions.

Ingredients: Organic Mango Fruit Extract, Organic Slippery Elm, Organic Marshmallow Root, Organic Lemongrass, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol and Natural Fragrance.

 

CURLING CUSTARD TM gives moisture and curl definition, hold and brilliant shiny hair all in one product!

It reduces bulk, defines & elongates your curls helping them to 'hang' better. CURLING CUSTARD TM will bring out the natural curl or wave pattern you never knew you had!

It is an advanced botanical formula made with ingredients that nourish and strengthen the hair. Utilizing the humectant properties of the Agave Nectar, CURLING CUSTARD TM will give weight to your hair, define your curls, remove frizz, provide long lasting hold and shine without ever being greasy, crunchy or drying to your hair.

This high performance product is very concentrated so a little goes a long way.

Pro Tip: For best results apply CURLING CUSTARD TM to soaking wet, freshly washed hair.

Ingredients: Botanical Infusion of Water, Horsetail, Chamomile, Nettle and Marshmallow, Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Agave Nectar Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Pectin, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate and Natural Fragrance.

Scalp Treatment
Section hair into 4 parts exposing scalp. Apply a small amount of oil to scalp, massage oil in with fingers and comb through to ends of hair. Leave in and style as desired.

Daily Use
Apply a small amount to scalp and comb through to ends.

Split End Care
Apply oil to ends of hair, place a processing cap on head and leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse and proceed with shampooing.

Every idea begins with a problem and ours was simple: healthy hair, healthy living, and an amazing wash-n-go. The idea of having one without the other just didn’t make sense.  We focused on changing the way we think about overall health and hair, they go hand in hand.  So how did we fix that? We took ingredients that help with overall wellness sprinkled with a little bit of old traditional hair recipes and created the new blends that Curls & Potions® needed to help change the way we look at hair and health.  Healthy Hair + Healthy Lifestyle = Good Hair.

column2: Dry Hair for fine hair bundle set
column3:
Treluxe Curl Renew & Restore Gentle Cleansing Rinse 8 oz

Defined curls start with clean curls.

Curl Renew & Restore is specially formulated with plant-based cleansing ingredients to gently lift product residue, dirt, and debris from your delicate curls and scalp; without disturbing the natural pH balance of your hair.

Slippery elm extract, coconut milk, and aloe vera are just a few key ingredients that deliver moisture, provide protection, and restore vibrancy to each curly strand.

How to use:

  1. Allow warm water to flow through hair until hair is soaking wet,
  2. Apply half a pump of Curl Renew & Restore™ Gentle Cleansing Rinse to hands,
  3. Gently massage Curl Renew & Restore™ Gentle Cleansing Rinse throughout scalp, then massage through hair,
  4. Rinse with luke-warm water,
  5. Repeat as needed,
  6. For additional moisture and detangling, apply Untie the Knot™ Nourishing Leave-in Conditioner throughout hair strands

Jessicurl Deep Conditioning Treatment 8 oz

Jessicurl Deep Conditioning Treatment is an intense pampering treatment for dry hair, a product must for maintaining healthy and moisturised curls and coils. It can be used as part of your weekly routine or a daily rinse out conditioner.

It’s thick. It’s rich. It’s moisturizing. And best of all, it doesn’t build up. It really is the ideal formula for restoring moisture to dry curly hair.

Directions: Apply to clean, wet hair. Comb through with a wide tooth comb and let it settle in for 30-60 minutes. For even more intense conditioning, use with heat. Rinse and style as usual. This can be used daily or as a leave-in conditioner for thicker and drier hair types.

Jessicurl Aloeba Daily Conditioner 8 oz

Jessicurl Aloeba Daily Conditioner was designed specifically for fine textured hair that gets weighed down easily. This conditioner uses jojoba, coconut, and avocado oils, along with aloe vera to moisturize the hair without being too heavy. The added benefit of a variety of herbs and spices make this a truly fabulous conditioner. It also works great on straight hair. Plus, all of Jessicurl conditioners have been formulated for use as leave-ins!

Directions:  Apply to wet hair, leave in 3-5 minutes and rinse. If you need more moisture and frizz control, Aloeba can also be used as a leave-in conditioner.

Curls & Potions Rice Milk Leave-in Conditioner 8 oz

This Rice Milk Leave-In Conditioner contains Ayurvedic herbs and butters to help detangle and soften all hair types.  Ayurveda is a holistic system that originated in India, emphasizing in keeping the body in balance by natural means.

Organic Aloe Juice helps to moisturize your hair, pH balances to seal the cuticle, and adds shine.

Cupuacu Butter is a light-weight butter that helps to promote hair elasticity and absorbs water which makes it a great butter to help seal moisture into the hair.

Rice Water is rich in inositol which is a carbohydrate that helps to protect hair against damage, but also repairs it.

Directions: Apply to wet/damp hair, do not rinse. Can be applied daily as needed for added moisture.

TréLuxe ReFlex™ Curl Styling Serum 8 oz

Designed to smooth, elongate, and define curls and waves, using a lightweight botanical formula. Great for wash-and-go use on fine hair that is easily weighed down. The flexible hold and smooth consistency provided by the ReFlex™ formula also makes it a great botanical setting lotion/serum for set styles (flexi-rods, perm-rods, curlformers, etc.) on all hair textures.

How to use:

After cleansing and conditioning

  1. separate soaking wet hair into 5 parts (4 quadrants of the head and the crown of the head),
  2. while hair is still soaking wet, distribute product through each section of hair, starting with the ends of the hair and working to the roots of the hair,
  3. style as desired,
  4. allow hair to air dry,
  5. (optional) for more volume, scrunch out hair while it is still wet.

Curlflo Green Tea & Organic Lemongrass Shampoo 8 oz

A sulphate free cream cleanser is just what your curls have been looking for.

This is a non stripping, foaming cleanser which is sulphate free! 

Powered by organic lemongrass which is rich in vitamin B to hydrate, being gentle on your curls. 

Formulated for coily, curly and wavy hair. 

Did we mention all Curl Flo products are handmade with Organic and Natural Ingredients?

How to use: Wet your hair thoroughly. Apply this cleanser to your fingertips, and massage directly onto your scalp in a circular motion. Apply more to your strands if required. 

Rinse thoroughly massaging your scalp to ensure all the product is removed. 

Repeat, if necessary

Camille Rose Jansyn's Moisture Max Conditioner 8 oz

A cocoa-aromatic moisturizing conditioner enriched with vitamins, crafted to decrease the appearance of split ends and frizz.

Sweet coconut milk and virgin coconut oil droplets are blended with organic aloe vera juices, then thickened with rich shea and cocoa butters for this ultra conditioning base. Evening primrose and aromatic rose hip oils are stirred into our mixture, then pureed with a shot of nourishing vitamin E to create this strengthening conditioner ideal for natural, colored or chemically-treated tresses.

Cachos Brazilian Combing Creme 8 oz

A 5 in 1 crème that can be used as a  curl defining crème,  moisturizer, deep conditioner, pre-shampoo treatment and a detangler. An ideal one and done product.

Brazilian Combing Crème is a revolutionizing deep moisturizer. It offers amazing curl definition as it coats and shapes every strand and control frizz. It smoothes the cuticles back into alignment.

As a deep conditioning treatment its enriched with fatty acids that deeply infuses the hair with nutrients and vitamins. It helps replenish, hydrate and treat the hair. Plus it seals in moisture for maximum hydration, quenching dry hair.

As a detangler this emollient crème provides plenty of slip to reduce friction, the comb glides through tangles to prevent breakage and knots.

Combing Crème is an ideal hair primer as it coats each strand to protect the hair during the styling process and weather damage. During 2nd day hair, the crème reactivates your curl just by spraying water to your hair. Make sure to adopt Brazilian Combing Crème as part of your healthy hair regimen. It truly is the best thing that happened to curly hair.

Every type of hair type and porosity will benefit from this amazing crème. 

This lightweight crème provides plenty of slip and curl definition while conditioning and protecting the hair from weather damage and frizz. 

Available in two sizes 4oz and 8oz

How to use:

Apply Combing Crème to freshly washed hair. Section hair into 4-6 sections.

 Apply a small amount of Combing Crème and apply to hair row by row, raking (shingling) the product through hair from root to tip. Start from the back sections and move to the front. Let hair air dry, sit underneath a drier, or use a diffuser.  

-Use the complete Cachos Brazil Hair Care to boost results.

Deep Conditioner Or Protein Treatment

Use it as is or add your additives of choice to customize your treatment

Treatment Preparation: If you choose to add additives such as aloe vera or honey (humectants), puree avocado, amino acids (protein treatment) or other ingredients (optional), please add your desired amount of crème to a separate container then add your additives.  

How to Apply:  Shampoo your hair as usual. Next, apply the crème to the hair and leave it on for 5 to 10 minutes for an intense conditioning.  Last, rinse it off and style as usual.  No need to add additional conditioner.

 Pre-Shampoo 

Use it as is or add your additives of choice to customize your treatment

Treatment Preparation: If you choose to add additives such as aloe vera or honey (humectants), puree avocado, amino acids (protein treatment) or other ingredients (optional), please add your desired amount of crème to a separate container then add your additives.  

How to Apply: Spritz your hair with water just to make it damp. Separate the hair into 2 to 4 sections and apply the crème one section at a time. Next, cover the hair with a plastic cap. Leave the treatment on for 20 to 30 minutes, sitting under hooded hair dryer is optional but highly recommended. Lastly, wash your hair as usual. Discard any unused treatment. Once or twice a month is enough to see some great results. 

Cachos Brazil High Porosity Hair & Scalp Elixir 4 oz

High porosity hair is prone to quickly absorbing water, product and oils, however is known to lose moisture as quickly as it absorbs it.

Cachos Brazil has formulated this necessary restorative hair elixir to tackle this, by locking in that moisture to keep high porosity hair bouncy and moisturised for longer.

This blend helps to fill in the gaps and tears found in high porosity hair by penetrating the hair shaft to deposit nutrients and seal in cuticles to prevent moisture loss, thicken the hair, to prevent frizz,  soothe the scalp, nourish the hair, melt away tangles and boost healthy hair growth.  Also, use this elixir to break the hard cast of gel aka "scrunch out the crunch".

Andiroba oil which is the main ingredient in this Elixir is the most used oil in the Amazon.  It's known to stimulate blood flow for faster hair growth and strengthen the hair's structure. It leaves the hair extremely hydrated, soft, with an amazing brilliance. It also shapes the hair’s curl pattern, leaving it defined and pliable

How to use: Moisture sealant, styling, detangling, shine, scalp care, LOC, scrunch out the crunch, pre-shampoo, hot oil treatment and frizz control.

Wet hair: Apply a small amount to damp hair from mid-length to ends and style as usual. 

Scrunch Out the Crunch (SOTC): Pour a pea sized amount of oil in the palm of your hand and rub your hands together.  Begin scrunching/squeezing your hair from the tips to the roots one section at a time.

Dry hair: Apply a small amount from mid-length to ends, to help smooth and eliminate frizz and help protect against environmental factors, including the sun and wind. Tip: try using the praying hand method to avoid disturbing your curl pattern.

Scalp Care:  Pour 2 to 3 drops of oil onto to your fingertips then massage/stimulate the scalp.  Repeat this process 2 to 3 times a week. 

Pre- Shampoo Treatment: Before applying, detangle the hair then section it into 2 to 4 parts. Secure it with clips. Pour a small of oil into the palm of your hands and gently apply it section by section, working the treatment into the hair. Once you've applied place a plastic shower cap on your hair to create moderate heat. Sit under a hooded dryer at a low setting, this is optional. Leave the Treatment on for 15 to 30 minutes. Then wash your hair as usual, you may need to shampoo twice.

Hot Oil Treatment: Use the same steps as pre-shampoo treatment mentioned above but use a heat bonnet for 30 minutes.

Detangle: Section the hair into 2 to 4 parts secure it with clips.  Next, apply the oil to one section at a time. Carefully finger detangle or use a detangling brush or comb.

Mielle Rosemary Mint Strengthening Shampoo was developed to gently cleanse your hair while providing key nutrients. With hair strengthening biotin and certified organic ingredients such as coconut and babassu seed oil, you can bring weak or brittle hair back from the brink. Not only does this strengthening shampoo feel great and smell even better, but it also provides intense moisture for all hair types along with unrivaled slip. A little goes a long way with a lot of lather, and this hair strengthening shampoo works great in concert with our Rosemary Mint Strengthening Hair Masque!

Mielle Rosemary Mint Strengthening Masque:

Does your hair deserve a little extra love? Add Mielle's Rosemary Mint Strengthening Hair Masque to your routine! This nutrient-rich formula is made to offer deep moisture and strength. Infused with Biotin to promote hair growth, alongside all natural and organic ingredients such as rosemary, mentha oil, honey, and coconut oil, this hair masque offers the hydration and nourishment your hair has been craving.

How to use: Massage into your hair after using our rosemary mint hair strengthening shampoo, let sit for 15 to 20 minutes, and then rinse to experience strong, beautiful, and healthy hair! Use a steamer or heat cap for a deeper conditioning treatment. Made with certified organic ingredients.

*Certified Organic Ingredients

Mielle Rosemary Mint Strengthening Oil

Achieve longer, stronger, healthier hair with this organic hair oil from Mielle.

• Features more than 30 essential oils and nutrients
• Infused with Biotin
• Use for daily hair care or specialized scalp treatments

Mielle Rosemary Mint organic hair oil is a nutrient-rich, intensive formula meant to help you address all of your hair concerns. From supporting length retention and nourishing hair follicles to smoothing split ends and preventing dry scalp, this organic hair oil uses natural ingredients and essential oils to provide the care your hair deserves.

Suitable for all hair types and textures.

How to use: 

Use it on protective styles, including braids and weaves, and enjoy its fresh, invigorating scent during your next hot oil treatment. This formula is made to be versatile!

Scalp Treatment
Section hair into 4 parts exposing scalp. Apply a small amount of oil to scalp, massage oil in with fingers and comb through to ends of hair. Leave in and style as desired.

Daily Use
Apply a small amount to scalp and comb through to ends.

Split End Care
Apply oil to ends of hair, place a processing cap on head and leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse and proceed with shampooing.

This discovery kit contains:

Hot Sauce: My vitamin-infused Hot Sauce contains the nutrients needed to promote a healthy, flourishing scalp. Hot Sauce is perfect for pre-poos and hot oil treatments, setting the stage for a fabulous week after wash day!

Chai Latte: The perfect cleanser for low porosity, oily or hair with moderate buildup. With black tea, burdock root, slippery elm and sage, Chai Latte nourishes as it cleanses without stripping.


Matcha Boost: With hydrolyzed quinoa and keratin proteins, Ecoslay Matcha Boost protein shake will strengthen even the weakest hair strands.


Banana Cream: With avocado, okra, coconut cream, aloe vera and banana, this super-thick, moisturizing treat deeply penetrates to nourish even the driest locks! And yes, it can be left in, pairing superbly with Orange Marmalade.


Ginger and Moringa Tea: Ecoslay's Ginger and Moringa Tea just might be the silver bullet that your regimen is missing! You'll immediately notice improved moisture retention and shine. Within a week, you'll observe increased style longevity, manageability and strength. These benefits and others will continue to pile up with each use.

A generous dose of Rice Water adds the nutrients that your curls need to keep them strong, shiny and bouncy. Rice Pudding mixes superbly with Ecoslay’s Orange Marmalade and Jello Shot allowing you to create the perfect styling combination for your hair’s needs.


Jello Shot: With okra extact, aloe vera juice and chamomile, this super-thick, strawberry-scented gel firmly holds even the kinkiest curls in place!


Lemon Buttercream: Achieve moisturized and defined results with this multi-purpose styling cream. With lemon and vanilla essential oils, this delicately scented lightweight cream is ideal for those who want softer curls or twists, braids, bantu knots and other protective styles with the perfect combination of hold, volume and moisture.

For softly defined and moisturized curls, apply to wet or damp hair.. Air dry or diffuse. For protective styling, apply to slightly damp hair. Style as desired.

Apple Sauce: The last edge control that you'll ever need to purchase! Completely drama-free, it delivers:

- Multi-day hold

- No flaking

- No caking (even with reapplication)

- Rinses easily with water

- 98% naturally-derived ingredients

column50:
Curls and Potions was founded with a pinch of a rebellious fighting spirit and a pinch of wanting to change one curl at a time. With one fighting Breast Cancer and one wanting to make the most of the curls and coils, the idea was born to focus on ways to blend healthy hair with overall wellness. 

Every idea begins with a problem and ours was simple: healthy hair, healthy living, and an amazing wash-n-go. The idea of having one without the other just didn’t make sense.  We focused on changing the way we think about overall health and hair, they go hand in hand.  So how did we fix that? We took ingredients that help with overall wellness sprinkled with a little bit of old traditional hair recipes and created the new blends that Curls & Potions® needed to help change the way we look at hair and health.  Healthy Hair + Healthy Lifestyle = Good Hair.

column52:
1. As a pre-poo: Part damp hair into 4 sections.
Draw a thin line of Hot Sauce along the part. Massage into hair, focusing on the scalp. Allow the goodness to marinate for 30 minutes before washing with Peppermint Schnapps or Chai Latte.

2) As a hot oil treatment: Allow the bottle of Hot Sauce to sit in a container of hot water until warm.
Part damp hair into 4 sections. Draw a thin line of Hot Sauce along the part. Massage thoroughly, allowing Hot Sauce to marinate for 30 minutes before washing with Peppermint Schnapps or Chai Latte.

3) Mixed in with your favorite deep conditioner: Mix an ample amount of hot sauce into your favorite deep conditioner, allowing the mixture to marinate for 30 minutes before washing with Peppermint Schnapps or Chai Latte.

Important Note: Hot Sauce gets its red color from carotenes like alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, and lycopene, which are the same nutrients that give tomatoes and carrots their rich colors.
Please protect clothing and linens accordingly.

We've found that when using the product sparingly and applied directly to the scalp, there have been few cases of staining. However, we do recommend a patch test on an inconspicuous spot just to be safe!

For Low Porosity or oily hair:
As a cleanser:
1. Apply sparingly directly to scalp
2. Massage scalp to produce suds
3. Start at the scalp and work your way through hair strands
4. Rinse thoroughly.

Remember to use a separate clarifier monthly to remove the typical buildup that low-porosity hair can experience.

For High Porosity hair:
As a monthly clarifier:
1. Apply sparingly directly to scalp
2. Massage scalp to produce suds
3. Start at the scalp and work your way through hair strands
4. Rinse thoroughly.

Since Chai Latte may be a bit drying if used regularly, it's suggested that you use Peppermint Schnapps as your regular cleanser.

column2: Flora & Curl African Citrus Superfruit Detangling Mist
column3:
PROTECT ME

Pollution and a build-up of a quick-fix styling products all impact on the quality of our hair. The light weight mist yields multi-tasking benefits to keep curls tangle-free while protect from external elements.

Infused with Argan Oil and Sweet Orange Oil, a few spritzes smoothens the hair cuticle, adds shine and minimizes frizz and flyaways to make detangling much easier.

This botanical formula is infused with a blend of bamboo Leaf Extract and Clementine Water - an innovative, botanical water that yields anti-pollution benefits to effectively protect curls from external elements.

Benefits:

. Smoothens the hair cuticles to help detangle with ease.

. Prevents static and frizz

. Creates soft , weightless shine

. Provides UV and thermal protection

. Works on all curl types

Directions: Shake well before use. Spray the mist liberally on hair to smoothen the cuticles, detangle and protect. This multi-tasker can be used in the following ways.

. To add an extra layer of protection against external damage e.g before swimming, heat styling or going out into the heat or cold.

. To detangle your curls and release tough knots

. Bonus benefit: To deliver extra shine to your curls

When used prior to blow drying, it helps protect hair from thermal styling damage and moisture loss as it seals the cuticle layer of the hair. When used as shine-boosting spray, hair is instantly transformed from dull to radiant. Great for both wet and dry hair.

Garden of key ingredients: 

Argan Oil: Adds radiance and shine

Bamboo Leaf Extract: Rich in silica and strengthens the hair cuticles

Clementine Water: Vitamin C rich, balances and soothes the scalp

Papaya Oil: Protects and nourishes

Watermelon Seed Oil: Rejuvenates hair and scalp

Full ingredients: Aqua, Sarbitol, Polysorbate 80, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Orange) Flower Water. Polyglyceryl-3 Betainate Acetate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Sweet Orange) flower oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Clementina (Clementine) Fruit \Extract, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil Caric Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Bambusa Vulgaris (Bamboo), Leaf Extract, Helianthus Anuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, B\enzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Citral*, Linalool*

**natural component of essential oils

. Plant-powered ingredients.

. No sulphates, silicones, drying alcohols, parabens, petroleum, mineral oil, artificial fragrances or artificial colours.

. For all curl types.

column2: Flora & Curl Rose Water & Honey Molasses Moisture Mask
column3:
HYDRATE ME

Powered by raw sugar Molasses and Honey, this intensive treatment replenishes moisture back to dry and damaged curls. If your curls are feeling brittle or dry, this buttery mask melts into curls to impart silkiness, with curls feeling replenished with lots of moisture.

Infused with marshmallow root extract, the detangling benefits are enhanced to help loosen up knots and tangles and add extra slip. The moisture treatment is infused with ultra hydrating and plant-powered ingredients for softer curls after wash day.

Benefits:

. Raw Sugar Molasses: A rich syrup derived from sugarcane with lots of natural minerals that soften the hair and enhance water absorption.

. Raw Honey: Attracts and binds moisture from the air into your hair to make if feel more supple.

. Rose Water: A natural curl conditioner for hydrated hair.

. Marshmallow Root: Minimises tangles and adds tons of slip.

. Avocado Oil: Nourishes the cuticles and adds shine. 

. Great for all curl types.

Directions:

After shampooing, apply the mask to your hair with a focus on the ends. A little goes a long way. place a shower cap and leave on for 15-20 minutes, then rinse out thoroughly with water and style as usual. Use every 4-6 weeks for an intensive moisture treatment, or whenever your curls feel excessively dry, brittle and damaged.

Ingredients: 

Raw Sugar Molasses: Adds intensive moisture

Raw Honey: Adds softness and slip

Avocado Oil: Protects cuticles

Olive Oil: Increases shine

Rose Water: Deeply hydrates curls

column2: Flora & Curl Rose Water & Honey Leave-in Detangler
column3:
HYDRATE ME

A botanical detangling conditioner that adds softness and slip to hair to release knots and tangles to make combing and styling manageability easier. It also serves as a leave-in moisturizer with a blend of Coconut and Calendula Oils, perfect for restoring hair's healthy moisture balance.

This Moisturizing leave-in conditioner is powerfully fortified with Rose Water and infused with Honey, Sunflower ,Oat, Marigold and vitamin B to smoothen the cuticle, add shine, definition and ease manageability, whilst promoting hair softness. It helps the comb and fingers glide through hair, leaving it tangle-free and protected from breakage. A great detangling solution for al textures.

Benefits: Formulated to instantly smoothen the hair cuticle and remove knots, snarls and tangles from wavy, curly and kink-textured hair. 

. Smoothening - Vitamin B (Panthenol) enhances natural sheen on the cuticles to create high shine and silkiness while reducing frizz and preventing more knots and tangles from forming.

. Daily Conditioning - Rose Flower Water adds moisture, slip and shine back into the hair for everyday moisture without weight.

Directions:

. Detangle: Part a small section of hair and apply product with focus on areas that are more prone to tangles and knots. Finger detangle or comb through section with a wide-tooth comb, until the comb or fingers glide through hair from roots to ends.

Condition: Can also be used as a daily no-rinse conditioner between washdays and after washing hair. Apply to restore moisture and PH balance back to hair after shampooing.

Use as often as needed on wet or dry hair.

Garden of key ingredients:

Rose Water: Instantly Hydrates

Honey: Softens and conditions

Coconut Oil: Adds shine

Oat Silk: Reduces Frizz and flyaways

Ylang Ylang: Balances Scalp

Full Ingridient List: Aqua ( Distilled Water), Rosa Damascena (Rose Damask), Flower Water*, Behentrimonium Methosulphate***, Hydroxypropyltrimonium (Honey), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol ( Pro Vitamin B5), Calendula Officinalis, (Calendula) Flower Extract, Cananga Adorata(Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Vegetable Glycerin, Avena Sativa Meal (Oat Silk) Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Litsea Cubeba (May Chang), Flower Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Benzyl Benzoate**, Benzyl Asalicylate**, Linalool**, Citral**, Geraniol**, Limonene**

*organic ingredient **natural component of essential oil***derived from coconut

NOTES

. Plant-powered ingredients.

. 100% natural fragrances.

. No sulphates, silicones, drying alcohols, parabens, petroleum, mineral oil, artificial fragrances or artificial colours.

. Curly girl friendly.

. For all curl types.

. Made in the UK.

column2: Masterclass LIVE - Hair Intimacy
column3:
We are so thrilled to host you at our 1st LIVE Masterclass! We have a fantastic class in store for you.

Date: Saturday 17th of September 2022

Time: 12:30pm - 3pm

Location: Intersect by Lexus, Gate Village 7, DIFC, Dubai 

Parking: Free Valet Parking available

** Limited Spaces Available**

What is the masterclass about ?

The aim of the masterclass is to provide you with:

  • The right foundational building blocks to truly understand textured hair.
  •  To help you build a more intimate relationship with your hair, understanding its scientific make up and the purpose of specific products.
  •  Understand why we often don't get the best out of our products.
  • How to maximize your texture's potential in order to achieve your hair goals.

What to expect ?

  • Hair education with real life examples and relatable takeaways
  • Intimate group setting for Q&A
  • Great food and drinks
  • Opportunity to meet other textured hair beauties
  • Product giveaways
  • Personalised gifts

 
Please note: Cash on delivery (COD) is not available for this masterclass.

column2: Soultanicals Glide & Go Deep Ayurvedic Fenugreek Mask Treatment
column3:
What makes this Ayurvedic mask treatment so powerful?

With powerful herbs like Triphala, Fenugreek, Fennel, Licorice, root & Neem, this mask is a no-fluff, straight-down-to-business kind and deep treatment!

- Fenugreek stimulates blood flow to the scalp, nourishes the hair follicles to promote faster and healthier new growth.
- Licorice root opens pores and strengths weakened hair follicles, which is often the cause of hair loss in the first place.
- The active compounds in Triphala repairs damaged hair and increases hair volume. Also reduces dandruff!

How is this Ayurvedic beneficial to Natural Hair Care?
The Ayurvedic approach is about treating natural tresses to be at its optimal best. Ayurvedic Hair Care strategies for optimizing hair health include strengthening, hair re/growth, luster and shine , aiding and soothing scalp issues, increasing blood circulation, thickening the hair and so many more. Since ancient times, Ayurvedic hair treatment utilizes natural hair ingredients that get the root of the hairs- both the literal hair roots and the underlying metabolic process that lead to the state of health of your hair.

column2: Innersense Hydrating Hair Mask
column3:
A hair mask to repair and revitalise dry, coarse and damaged hair.
Repair and strengthen hair with this rich treatment mask. Shea butter, tamanu and coconut oils, Flax seed and quinoa provide restorative hydration. 

Ideal for all hair types and textures


Key Ingredients:
Shea Butter: an intense moisturizer, is high in fatty acids and nutrients.
Flax seed: high in Omega-3 fatty acids, restores strength and elasticity, reducing breakage.
Tamanu is abundant in antioxidants, essential fatty acids and nutrients to regenerate, strengthen and protect. Lightweight and easily absorbed into the hair without build up.
Hydrolyzed quinoa: adds proteins rich in nutrients, vitamins and amino acids.
Coconut Oil: derived from the fatty acids of coconut provides moisture.
Essential oils of Sage and Vanilla provide a tranquilizing and relaxing ceremonial experience.

column2: Innersense True Enlightenment Scalp Scrub
column3:
A scalp scrub enlightenment exfoliating treatment

This pre-cleanse exfoliation treatment is formulated with Hawaiian Red salt, which is rich in volcanic clay and minerals. Crafted to gently remove impurities with apple fruit to restore hydration to the scalp while celery seed extract and peppermint oil stimulates blood flow. Tea tree oil extracts help to soothe inflammation and irritation.

Ideal for everyone

Fragrance note: Peppermint

Key Ingredients:
Hawaiian Red salt: Hawaiian Red salt is unrefined sea salt; mixed with rich volcanic clay and some 80 minerals gives it its natural red hue. Hawaiian Red salt is also known as Alaea salt and traditionally used by Hawaiians to cleanse and purify. This salt acts as a gentle exfoliator to remove impurities from the scalp.

Apple fruit extract: Apple contains numerous vitamins to the scalp, adding to the overall health of the hair. Minerals like magnesium, potassium, copper and calcium to help lower the chance of hair loss and shedding by keeping hair follicles nourished. It also provides intense hydration to moisturize the scalp.

Peppermint oil: stimulates blood flow, exhilarates the senses and aids in skin irritation and reduces itching. 

Celery seed extract: soothes irritated itchy scalp and decreases excess sebum production.

Tea tree oil: provides relief to relieve sensitive area skin inflammation as well as provides antiseptic, antifungal and antimicrobial properties.

column2: Innersense Inner Peace Whipped Creme Texturizer
column3:
A styling cream to create hold, separation and texture.

Keep your curls and coils defined and separated with a light weight texturizing  creme formulated with Certified Organic shea butter and bee-friendly honey to condition while adding flexible definition to hair. This ultra-moisturizing petroleum-free formula protects from humidity, eliminating frizz and flyaways. 

Works well with all hair types

Key Ingredients: Shea Butter: Certified Organic,  shea butter is an excellent emollient for personal carer applications. It is the natural fat obtained from the fruit of the karite tree. its rich content of bio-active triterpene esters provide beneficial effects including anti-irritancy, anti-inflammatory and enhanced UV-B protection. 

Orange Flower Oil: benefits include aiding in anxiety, calming colds, insomia, nervousness, and skin care. Orange flower oil provides a harmonizing and uplifting natural aroma top note.

Honey: is a humectant, which means it attracts and retains moisture. This makes honey a natural fit in a variety of moisturizing  products including skin creams and lotions, shampoos and conditioners. Honey also acts as anti-irritant, making it suitable for sensitive skin. In hair care products it has a slight holding power for body.

column2: Innersense I Create Shine
column3:
Behind the look on In Her Mirror — the stylers used to shape her defined, glossy, camera-ready curls

A silicone-free shine shield that protects and reflects your healthiest, glossiest hair.

This silicone-free shine oil nourishes, protects, and illuminates all hair types and textures. Crafted with a light weight blend of cold-pressed plant extracts, the luxe formula absorbs into strands in seconds, radiating shine from beneath the hair's surface.
Smoothing macadamia and cranberry seed oils seal in glossy moisture while shutting out frizz, antioxidant-rich sunflower and sesame oils shield against damage, and grounding lotus flower leaves behind a subtly soothing floral fragrance.

Ideal for all hair types and textures.

Fragrance note: Lotus flower

Key Ingredients:
Cranberry Seed Oil: rich in antioxidants, cranberry seed oil safeguards against harmful UV rays and other environmental damage-maintaining vibrant colour and healthy hair.
Sunflower Seed oil: the perfectly balanced blend of Omega fatty acids in sunflower seed oil delivers deep moisture, promotes elasticity, and creates luxurious-looking luster.
Macadamia Oil: a feather weight moisturizer, macadamia oil creates an invisible seal on strands and smooths frizz and reflects light for maximum radiance.
Sesame Oil: this nutrient-packed oil replenishes, repairs and strengthens strands, preventing breakage and split ends while boosting elasticity and bounce.

Maximise moisture with this emollient-rich conditioner for think, coarse and damaged hair. Certified Organic rice, quinoa and flax seed strengthen the hair follicle while shea butter and coconut nourish and hydrate to control frizz, This silicone-free formula leaves hair naturally beautiful.


Best for thick, coarse, thirsty and damaged hair.


Fragrance note: Sage, vanilla.


Key Ingredients:


Aloe Vera:  known for healing hair and scalp. An effective conditioner leaving hair smooth and shiny. Shea Butter, an intense moisturizer, high in fatty acids, nutrients. Monoi Oil restores luster to dry brittle hair, conditions and deeply penetrates imparting great shine and body.


Flax Seed: high in omega 3 fatty, acids. Restores strength and elasticity, reducing breakage.


Tamanu: is abundant with essential fatty acids and nutrients to regenerate, strengthen and protect, Light weight and easily absorbed into the hair without build up. Rich in nutrients, vitamins, proteins and amino acids.


Coconut Oil: derived from the fatty acids of coconut provides moisture. Essential oils of Sage and Vanilla provide a tranquilizing and relaxing ceremonial experience.

column2: Innersense Detox Hair Mask
column3:
A clarifying detox treatment to remove buildup.


Remove buildup and residue with this clarifying detox mask.


Charcoal, kaolin clay and certified organic white vinegar draw microparticles to the surface without stripping hair of natural oils.

Ideal for all hair types and textures.


Fragrance note: Sage, vanilla

Key ingredients:


Charcoal: is a gentle detoxifier and helps to draw out dirt, toxins and impurities from the hair and scalp.


Kaolin clay: also called " china clay" is a soft white clay named after the hill in China (Kao-ling) from which it was mined for centuries. This dynamic clay helps remove excess oil, dirt and product build up from hair and scalp.


Certified organic white vinegar: long used as clarifier for hair, helps to increase shine, balance PH and reduce frizz and hair porosity.

column2: Camille Rose Aloe Whipped Butter Gel
column3:
Moisturise your locks and define your curls with this silky soft buttery gel with nourishing fruit botanicals, crafted to provide moisture and light styling hold.  


Finding that happy place between a creamy lotion and a light hold gel, this luxurious formula transforms your crown from dry and frizzy to big and bouncy.


Enriched with Castor Oil and Jojoba, the formula deeply hydrates the strands, right down to the follicle, minimising breakage, dryness and split ends.


Packed with Vitamins C and E, the gel offers antioxidant protection, defending the hair against environmental aggressors which can cause dryness.


Finally, Almond Extract works to condition the hair from root to scalp, while Aloe Vera improves moisture retention, strengthening the hair’s natural barriers to lock in hydration. Working in perfect harmony, this botanical blend strengthens hair, promoting growth, renewing texture and leaving a wonderful shine.

For wavy-curly hair types: Shampoo and condition hair. Section hair and detangle each section using Inashi Aloe Hibiscus Leave-in Conditioner/Detangler or the Pamper My Curls All in One Moisture Mist. While hair is dripping wet, apply gel to hair quickly and evenly from root to tip.

For more defined curls, scrunch or twist your hair. Flip hair upside down and scrunch product in evenly to create more volume.

For curly-kinky hair types: Shampoo and condition hair. Section hair and detangle each section using Inashi Aloe Hibiscus Leave-in Conditioner/Detangler. While hair is dripping wet, pull gel through hair from root to tip.

Smooth with fingers to elongate the curls. Use a spray bottle to re-wet hair for any dry sections

column52:
For wavy-curly hair types: Shampoo and condition hair. Section hair and detangle each section using Inashi Pamper My Curls All-in-One Moisture Mist. While hair is wet or damp, apply the styling foam to hair quickly and evenly from root to tip.

For more defined curls, scrunch or twist your hair. Flip hair upside down and scrunch product in evenly to create more volume. For a firmer hold apply the Inashi Define and Shine Liquid Styling Gel

For curly-kinky hair types: Shampoo and condition hair. Section hair and detangle each section using Pamper My Curls All-In-One Moisture Mist or Aloe Hibiscus Leave in Conditioner. While hair is dripping wet, apply the Pamper My Curls Hair and Scalp Elixir to each section then pull styling foam through hair from root to tip.

Smooth with fingers to elongate the curls. Use the Pamper My Curls All-In-One Moisture Mist to re-wet hair for any dry sections.

column2: Curls Blueberry Bliss Reparative Mask
column3:
CURLS Blueberry Bliss Reparative Hair Mask is a deep penetrating, intensive, deep conditioning hair mask guaranteed to prevent breakage, repair damage and enhance growth. It's clinically proven to repair, protect, restore, and grow your curls.


Benefits:

- Softens, detangles, moisturizes, conditions & hydrates your curls

- Repairs damage

- Protects against breakage

- Encourages hair growth


Key Ingredients:

- Blueberries, rich in vitamin C & B complex, are good for increasing hair growth by        improving oxygenation & circulation of blood in the body - particularly the scalp

- Proanthocyanidins, the plant chemical found in blueberries, interacts with hair follicles to accelerate growth & slow down hair graying and loss

Curls was founded by Mahisha Dellinger.
Disenchanted with the lack of natural hair products with quality ingredients and dependability, Mahisha sought to create a new brand that resonates with women like her.
Curls CEO collaborated with leading cosmetic and wellness experts to develop CURLS. Her desire was to create a remarkable, high quality, natural hair care line for an overlooked audience.

column2: Jessicurl Too Shea! Moisturizing Conditioner
column3:
Jessicurl Too Shea! Moisturizing Conditioner is the kind of conditioner that people write poems about. It contains shea butter, jojoba oil, avocado oil and tons of lovely herbs and spices that are all great for hair and scalp.


Together they combine to make a thick, moisturizing conditioner that isn’t too heavy and not at all greasy. It makes your curls so soft you’ll have a hard time keeping your hands out of them. (But do try – touching your curls too much is a no-no). Plus, all of Jessicurl conditioners have been formulated for use as leave-ins!

column2: Jessicurl Spiralicious Styling Gel
column3:
Jessicurl Spiralicious Styling Gel is much thicker than Confident Coils and very gel-like in consistency but does not flake in the hair like many gels can.

While it can dry crunchy, that initial crunch scrunches out really easily, leaving the hair very soft to the touch, but the curls hold up all day. No ramen-noodle curls here!

One of the best parts about it is the frizz control. If you currently use Rockin’ Ringlets, you’ll find that the two work together really well. If you don’t find you need a curl enhancer (which is what Rockin’ Ringlets is), Spiralicious will provide you with fabulous hold and frizz control but without giving you “helmet head".

column2: Jessicurl Confident Coils Styling Solution
column3:
Jessicurl Confident Coils Styling Solution is a creamy styling product with a consistency thin enough to make it easy to distribute through even the tightest, kinkiest curls.

It creates amazing definition and provides excellent humidity protection. By itself it’s not super curl enhancing, which makes it great for tighter curl patterns looking to elongate rather than enhance curls. For those with looser curls, using it with Rockin’ Ringlets will give you all the bounce, definition and frizz control you need.

Jessicurl Deep Conditioning Treatment is an intense pampering treatment for dry hair, a product must for maintaining healthy and moisturised curls and coils. It can be used as part of your weekly routine or a daily rinse out conditioner.

column2: Jessicurl Gentle Lather Shampoo
column3:
Jessicurl Gentle Lather Shampoo is completely different from those bad old days of harsh shampoos.

It uses only the gentlest cleansing agents available and creates a mild creamy lather. It will clean your hair but will not strip it out, so you can actually wash your hair and have it look good on the SAME day! I know, it’s hard to believe, but it’s true.

If you have fine hair that gets weighed down easily, you’ll especially love this because there are no added oils or moisturizers. It is also a great shampoo for straight hair.

﻿

column2: TréLuxe Hi! Definition™ Curl Enhancer Styling Gel
column3:
Enjoy style + strong hold without sacrificing on softness.

The strong hold, defining gel your curls need to fight Middle Eastern humidity. Whether you have waves, curls, coils or kinks, it has been tried and tested, this is a styler you need in your stash!

A high performance curl definer that causes curls to take shape, providing long lasting curl definition and shine, and giving you the upper hand in the fight against frizz.  While many styling gels provide hold, this one also helps curls maintain moisture, thanks to its all-natural, Active Botanicals™ ingredients, and other premium natural extracts.

Key Benefits

- Flake-free strong hold

- Enhances definition + shine

- Moisture balance for curls

- Alcohol free

- Great for layering

Formulated with all premium natural extracts, this defining gel not only locks in your style but also helps maintain moisture retention, shine retention, and frizz control all day long. column52:
After cleansing and conditioning
1. Separate soaking wet hair into 5 parts (4 quadrants of the head and the crown of the head),
2. While hair is still soaking wet, distribute product through each section of hair**, starting with the ends of the hair and working to the roots of the hair,
3. Style as desired,
4. Allow hair to air dry,
5. (optional) for more volume, scrunch out hair while it is still wet.

*Hi! Definition™ Curl Enhancer can also be used on dry or damp hair to smooth hair edges.

** Most people find that for full head use, a dime to nickel sized amount per section is sufficient- less for hair under 6 inches long; more for hair over 12 inches long. Adjust amount applied as needed.

column50:
Curls and Potions was founded with a pinch of a rebellious fighting spirit and a pinch of wanting to change one curl at a time. With one fighting Breast Cancer and one wanting to make the most of the curls and coils, the idea was born to focus on ways to blend healthy hair with overall wellness. 

Every idea begins with a problem and ours was simple: healthy hair, healthy living, and an amazing wash-n-go. The idea of having one without the other just didn’t make sense.  We focused on changing the way we think about overall health and hair, they go hand in hand.  So how did we fix that? We took ingredients that help with overall wellness sprinkled with a little bit of old traditional hair recipes and created the new blends that Curls & Potions® needed to help change the way we look at hair and health.  Healthy Hair + Healthy Lifestyle = Good Hair.

column2: Inahsi Naturals Coconut Avocado Curl Defining Custard
column3:
This natural styling custard (glycerine free) will leave your curls moisturized, defined and oh so shiny. The panthenol along with the rich oils of avocado and coconut help to strengthen the hair. This curl defining custard provides a light hold without leaving your hair dry or crunchy. It is also great to sleek down edges.

Directions: For wavy-curly hair types: Shampoo and condition hair. Section hair and detangle each section using Aloe Hibiscus Leave-in Conditioner/Detangler. Apply gel to hair quickly and evenly, working it in deeply with your fingers. For more defined curls, scrunch or twist your hair. Flip hair upside down and scrunch product in evenly to create more volume.

For curly-kinky hair types: Shampoo and condition hair. Section hair and detangle each section using Aloe Hibiscus Leave-in Conditioner/Detangler. Apply light oil or Island Breeze Moisturizing Hair Whip to each section then pull gel through hair from root to tip. Re-wet hair for any dry sections.

Great for Wash and Gos, Updos, Rollersets, Twist/Twist-outs, Braids/Braid-outs, Bantu-Knots

Ingredients: Aqua (Water/Eau), Methylcellulose, Hydrolyzed Oats, Parfum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbic Acid, *Benzyl Benzoate

column50:
Curls and Potions was founded with a pinch of a rebellious fighting spirit and a pinch of wanting to change one curl at a time. With one fighting Breast Cancer and one wanting to make the most of the curls and coils, the idea was born to focus on ways to blend healthy hair with overall wellness. 

Every idea begins with a problem and ours was simple: healthy hair, healthy living, and an amazing wash-n-go. The idea of having one without the other just didn’t make sense.  We focused on changing the way we think about overall health and hair, they go hand in hand.  So how did we fix that? We took ingredients that help with overall wellness sprinkled with a little bit of old traditional hair recipes and created the new blends that Curls & Potions® needed to help change the way we look at hair and health.  Healthy Hair + Healthy Lifestyle = Good Hair.

column50:
Curls and Potions was founded with a pinch of a rebellious fighting spirit and a pinch of wanting to change one curl at a time. With one fighting Breast Cancer and one wanting to make the most of the curls and coils, the idea was born to focus on ways to blend healthy hair with overall wellness. 

Every idea begins with a problem and ours was simple: healthy hair, healthy living, and an amazing wash-n-go. The idea of having one without the other just didn’t make sense.  We focused on changing the way we think about overall health and hair, they go hand in hand.  So how did we fix that? We took ingredients that help with overall wellness sprinkled with a little bit of old traditional hair recipes and created the new blends that Curls & Potions® needed to help change the way we look at hair and health.  Healthy Hair + Healthy Lifestyle = Good Hair.

column3:
A lightweight hair oil that easily absorbs into the hair, scalp & prevents build-up. It boosts your hair growth, nourishes your edges, controls frizz and beautifully seals the cuticles with moisture. Plus, it stimulates blood flow and balances the scalp's natural oils. Your natural and curly hair will be deeply nourished, sealed, protected and moisturized.


- Easily penetrates low porosity hair

- Length retention.

- Melts away tangles.

- Balances the scalp's natural oil production.

- Soothes itchy scalp.

- Smooths split ends

- Pre-shampoo & hot oil treatment.

- Prevents build-up. 


Low Porosity Hair & Scalp Elixir promotes length retention.  All due to it's quick absorption ability.  It deeply penetrates tight cuticles and hair follicles to provide much needed nourishment. Powered with maracuja oil which is known as a cleansing oil, it both helps prevent and remove build-up Making this hair oil the perfect oil for hair growth. It's double function both seals and penetrates the hair cuticles. What else can we ask for? Happy hair growth!

column50:
Cachos means "Curls" in Portuguese.

Packed with the finest ingredients from the Amazon Rainforest, Cachos Brazil have crafted products that will thoroughly nourish your strands, whilst also increasing manageability, elasticity and improve the overall health of your hair.

From ancient roots and practises, the products contain exceptional herbs that are phenomenal for strengthening the hair naturally and also survive in such humid climates.

The beauty of these products - a little goes a long way! You no longer need to layer your strands with lots of products to see real results. Your hair will be full of quality ingredients that are rich in nutrients, vitamins, beta-carotene, absorption, and protection.

The entire product range is CG approved.
column52:
Moisture sealant, styling, detangling, shine, scalp care, LOC, scrunch out the crunch, pre-shampoo, hot oil treatment and frizz control.

Wet hair: Apply a small amount to damp hair from mid-length to ends and style as usual.

Scrunch Out the Crunch (SOTC): Pour a pea sized amount of oil in the palm of your hand and rub your hands together.
Begin scrunching/squeezing your hair from the tips to the roots one section at a time.

Dry hair: Apply a small amount from mid-length to ends, to help smooth and eliminate frizz and help protect against environmental factors, including the sun and wind.

Tip: try using the praying hand method to avoid disturbing your curl pattern.

Scalp Care: Pour 2 to 3 drops of oil onto to your fingertips then massage/stimulate the scalp. Repeat this process 2 to 3 times a week.

Pre- Shampoo Treatment: Before applying, detangle the hair then section it into 2 to 4 parts. Secure it with clips. Pour a small of oil into the palm of your hands and gently apply it section by section, working the treatment into the hair.
Once you've applied place a plastic shower cap on your hair to create moderate heat. Sit under a hooded dryer at a low setting, this is optional. Leave the Treatment on for 15 to 30 minutes.
Then wash your hair as usual, you may need to shampoo twice.

Hot Oil Treatment: Use the same steps as pre-shampoo treatment mentioned above but use a heat bonnet for 30 minutes.

Detangle: Section the hair into 2 to 4 parts secure it with clips. Next, apply the oil to one section at a time. Carefully finger detangle or use a detangling brush or comb.

Precautions:
-Use product only as directed.
-Avoid contact with eyes.
-Avoid introducing water to natural product
-For external use only.
column53:

Note: Product for cosmetic use only, it's not suited for human consumption. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Please avoid the product if you have a nut allergy.

column52:
A multi-purpose hair cream that can be used as a styler, deep conditioner, moisturizer, detangler & pre-shampoo treatment. Powered with Brazilian ingredients like pracaxi oil and babassu oil, you're sure to have hydrated, defined, bouncy, shiny & healthy hair. Banish dry hair & breakage once and for all with the Queen of All Creams.

How to use:
Apply Combing Crème to freshly washed hair. Section hair into 4-6 sections.

Apply a small amount of Combing Crème and apply to hair row by row, raking (shingling) the product through hair from root to tip. Start from the back sections and move to the front. Let hair air dry, sit underneath a drier, or use a diffuser.
Use the complete Cachos Brazil Hair Care System to boost results.

Deep Conditioner Or Protein Treatment

Use it as is or add your additives of choice to customize your treatment

Treatment Preparation: If you choose to add additives such as aloe vera or honey (humectants), puree avocado, amino acids (protein treatment) or other ingredients (optional), please add your desired amount of crème to a separate container then add your additives.

How to Apply: Shampoo your hair as usual. Next, apply the crème to the hair and leave it on for 5 to 10 minutes for an intense conditioning. Last, rinse it off and style as usual. No need to add additional conditioner.

Pre-Shampoo
Use it as is or add your additives of choice to customize your treatment

Treatment Preparation: If you choose to add additives such as aloe vera or honey (humectants), puree avocado, amino acids (protein treatment) or other ingredients (optional), please add your desired amount of crème to a separate container then add your additives.

How to Apply: Spritz your hair with water just to make it damp. Separate the hair into 2 to 4 sections and apply the crème one section at a time.
Next, cover the hair with a plastic cap. Leave the treatment on for 20 to 30 minutes, sitting under hooded hair dryer is optional but highly recommended.
Lastly, wash your hair as usual. Discard any unused treatment. Once or twice a month is enough to see some great results.

column2: Tangle Teezer - Thick & Curly
column3:
Looking for the ultimate detangling brush for thick, curly hair?

A real game-changer for many, Tangle Teezer's Thick & Curly detangling hairbrush is designed for thick, curly or textured hair. A curly girl must have!

It can be used on wet and dry hair and glides through the hair, helping banish tangles and kink with its unique two-tiered teeth. The teeth are longer and stronger than The Original, delivering increased confidence in detangling challenging hair types.

The firm-flex teeth detangle quickly and easily without locking in tangles and causing tugging and pulling. The long teeth detangle, whereas the short teeth smooth the hair cuticle without pulling out your curls and coils. 

Perfect for thick, curly, coily and kinky hair types

column34: As I Am Twist Defining Cream
column50:
As I Am products consists of wonderfully formulated products designed specifically for; curly and tightly coiled hair; each with an impressive ingredient listing that includes many of nature's finest organic ingredients.

Perfect for Type 3 & 4 Hair Types.
column52:
Use after cleansing and conditioning, apply As I Am Leave-In Conditioner liberally, according to instructions. This will help prevent flaking.

Apply Twist Defining Cream to detangled hair while it is wet, in small sections, then twist away! Spray with water if hair begins to dry before you're done.

Air drying is recommended. You may also use a hood dryer on the low setting.

For twist outs, undo twists and separate, only after hair is completely dry.

You may use Twist Defining Cream for shingling, too, by combing it section-by-section through clean, detangled soaking wet hair with a wide-toothed comb.

Dry thoroughly before fluffing and separating.

column2: TGIN Green Tea Super Moist Leave - In Conditioner
column3:
TGIN Green Tea Super Moist Leave In Conditioner & Detangler naturally solves all your dryness and tangling needs throughout your day without the slightest hassle or mess.

Packed with natural fragrances from Green Tea, Shea butter, and Argan oil, this lightweight formula has the perfect combination of moisture and antioxidants, which helps improve manageability, fight frizz, and transform dry, brittle strands into soft, smooth and healthy hair. This natural conditioner is great for detangling and is safe for kids.


SOFT, SHINY AND MANAGEABLE HAIR: Our Green Tea Super Moist Leave in Conditioner contains Argan oil which penetrates the scalp to nourish the roots of your hair, facilitating hair growth.


EFFECTIVELY DETANGLES KNOTS: Tangles are caused when the outer layer of your hair (the cuticle) becomes damaged and ruptured. This leave - in conditioner tackles this by repairing the cuticle.


REDUCES FRIZZ, FLYAWAYS AND BREAKAGE: One unique ingredient in this leave in conditioner, Argan oil, not only heals hair, but prevents future damage, does away with split ends, and diminishes dryness.


REPLENISHES HAIRS NATURAL OILS: This lightweight formula restores your hair’s natural oils without excessive build-up, leaving your hair smooth and lustrous and easing scalp inflammation.



PROMOTES HAIR GROWTH: This leave in conditioner contains Green Tea and Argan oil to encourage hair growth while preventing hair loss. It does this by enabling better blood flow to the scalp.

column2: Protein Defence Treatment by Healthy Hair Studio by Enitan
column3:
Case studies have shown that hair strands are degraded by a number of factors such as sunlight so now imagine what your self inflicted actions would have caused also. Why do you need to know this because your hair is keratin.


Protein defence is a pure and concentrated protein hair treatment designed to build back into your hair what it was originally created and structured to have. This will lead to breakage-resistant hair without causing stiff hair side effects. ALL hair textures and types need a build up in keratin levels as part of an effective hair regimen.


Protein treatments should be incorporated into your regimen every 4 - 6 weeks dependent on your hair porosity. Safe to use on adults and children. Be sure to follow the labelled instructions for optimal results.

column3:
The Original Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil is a proven effective hair and skin care product. This oil treats dry, brittle and damaged hair by strengthening it from root to tip. This Original JBCO formula has a medium consistency, a light ashy aroma and a high ash content. Ideal for promoting healthy hair growth. Sunny Isle's organic castor seeds are roasted and ground by a manual grinder and then the crushed beans are boiled to extract the 100% pure, dark brown, organic oil.


This oil is perfect for hot oil treatments, scalp massages and as a sealant.
